attributes.title: Just read won’t regret
attributes.review: So today I got this app so that I can support trump 🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻 but you sign up it takes 2 days! And you have to put tour address in there too so don’t get it 😡

attributes.title: A WASTE OF TIME, AND STORAGE!!!
attributes.review: I can’t believe that I actually downloaded this it’s so confusing, I was having complications the first day I downloaded it.  This app is horrible please DO NOT waste your time, and storage

attributes.title: Terribly slow!
attributes.review: Don’t download this app, it functions so slow and took forever to download. I can’t help support someone if I don’t have the chance

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!
attributes.review: I had high hopes for this app, but IMMEDIATELY when I opened it, I was just shown a creepy man asking for my phone number!! This is very frightening to me and overall has given me a lot of anxiety and fear. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP OR GIVE ANY INFORMATION TO THEM!!!!

attributes.title: Not worth the download
attributes.review: This app is filled with glitches and constantly crashes. In addition to this it is also filled with false and un checked claimed

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: It is a very terrible app it literally freezes every time I try to go see our sexy president. U need to fix that. And when I got in the greeting was terrible they said I was fat and ugly and they called me a SIR🥺😭🤡👁👄👁

attributes.title: MY GOLDFISH DIED
attributes.review: I had my goldfish right next to me as I was downloading the app and as soon as I opened the app I was scared by the picture and I looked at my goldfish and he was upside down…PLSSS TAKE THIS HORRIBLE APP DOWN 😢😢 it would make me feel better/safer

attributes.title: It took too long to download
attributes.review: It took almost a day for it to download it when it did my phone crashed for week.

attributes.title: Terrible app this app is not worth being in the App Store
attributes.review: This app is very trash and offensive to my country cause this man wants all Hispanics out of America and that is racist so I decide this app gets banned who else is with me? ✊🏽🇲🇽

attributes.title: this app is cursed!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and within 24 hours got in a car crash and my fiancé died...I can’t say if the two are related but I wouldn’t risk it you guys.
